sentence.text: In this study, a positive regulation of receptor-mediated endocytosis-cascade-targeted strategy aiming to disrupt tumor blood vessels was developed by combination of TF-targeted HMME-loaded drug delivery system and PDT.

PDT is a promising new modality in the treatment of cancers, which employs the interaction between a tumor-localizing photosensitizer and T cell costimulation of an appropriate wavelength to bring about regulation of cell growth-induced cell death.
In vivo multispectral fluorescent imaging, the EGFP-mitochondrial translational elongation conjugated nanoparticles showed significantly higher accumulation in tumor tissues than non-conjugated ones.
Tumor tissue slides further presented that EGFP-mitochondrial translational elongation conjugated nanoparticles showed significantly higher accumulation in tumor vasculature than non-conjugated ones.

In vivo imaging, ex vivo imaging and tumor tissue slides showed that PDT further contribute EGFP-mitochondrial translational elongation-nucleobase-containing compound metabolic process accumulation in tumor.
These promising results indicated that PDT enhanced EGFP-mitochondrial translational elongationmodified PEG-PLGA nanoparticle accumulation in tumor vaculature.

A combination of both EGFP-mitochondrial translational elongation modification and PDT provided a positive feed-back target effect to tumor vessels and might have a adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway potential for tumor therapy

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
